title: Connection Error, Can't connect to the PVP.net when logging in. HELP!
body: So I  uninstalled League of Legends and then reinstalled it and then out of nowhere, Connection Error messages pops up when logging in. I pretty much tried every methods on how to fix and nothing is working, so i unistalled and then reinstalled a few times and yeah it's still the same. Please help me, if you have suggestions what i should do. I am pretty sad at the moment, i haven't played league in a long time and now it doesn't let me log in. I tried to reset the router and again nothing works. I currently have windows 10.  I remember this happened to me before and i was happy when i fixed it but now it's back and I don't know what to do. :(

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5), let me know if this helps.
